title: MyFonts
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20131010202408/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Font Retailers](http://web.archive.org/web/20131010202408/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Font%20Retailers) : MyFonts**

[MyFonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20131010202408/http:/www.myfonts.com/) is an extensive online source for finding, trying, and buying fonts. With more than 41,000 fonts on one easy-to-use web site and some of the best font search tools on the web. MyFonts has sold over one million fonts.

MyFonts.com is owned by [Bitstream](http://web.archive.org/web/20131010202408/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Bitstream).
author: James Grieshaber
